title: Why HCL Tech Management is comfortable with a 12-14% revenue guidance for FY23 - Economic Times
content: Why HCL Tech Management is comfortable with a 12-14% revenue guidance for FY23  Economic Times
description: “Compared to 12 or 18 months ago, we are in a much better place today because I have not seen HCL Tech delivering 5% sequential growth on the trot for three consecutive quarters and the CQGR over the last three consecutive quarters in our services business has been at 5.2%.”
